steps.content: Add the guidelines for the body. Use a triangle-like curve for the upper part of body. Draw a circle for the hips.

steps.content: Draw the hair as you like.

steps.title: Add more accessories if you like.
steps.content: Add more accessories if you like. You can draw accessories like gloves and necklaces.

steps.title: Draw a model on the front and the back of a sheet of card or paper.
steps.content: Draw a model on the front and the back of a sheet of card or paper.

steps.title: Make lines around the model drawing a design.
steps.content: Make lines around the model drawing a design. Let your imagination go wild.Just try put a picture on to your mind first and then try drawing it!

steps.title: Wrap it up.
steps.content: Wrap it up. Designing is really fun. But too much embellishment is just too much. It's easy to get carried away, even the simplest outfits are the coolest.

steps.title: Remember, this is your work, you can do anything, as long as it's yours.
steps.content: Remember, this is your work, you can do anything, as long as it's yours. Getting inspiration is great and helps a lot, but make something you would wear. Draw a similar outfit, but make it more you. Have fun, it's all yours.
